text: Raul Ștefan Gavîrliță (born 18 August 1999) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Metaloglobus București, on loan from Astra Giurgiu.Metaloglobus a făcut instrucţie cu CS Blejoi, în primul amical din 2020. Un jucător de la FCSB şi altul de la Astra, noutăţile din lotul lui Măldărăşanu. liga2.prosport.ro ==Honours== ;Astra Giurgiu *Cupa României: Runner-up 2018–19 ==References== ==External links== * * Raul Gavîrliță at lpf.ro Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Brașov Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Liga I players Category:FC Astra Giurgiu players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Metaloglobus București players
title: Raul Gavîrliță
